articles.author: Deutsche Welle
articles.title: India detects 1st suspected mpox case - DW (English)
articles.description: India's health ministry said it was fully prepared to deal with "an isolated travel related case" and said robust measures were in place to contain it.
articles.content:
India reported a "suspected mpox case" on Sunday and made assurances that it had "robust measures" in place to contain the case, the Health Ministry said in a statement.
